title: Omen, the cancelled champion
body:
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Omen

I never noticed this. Riot could just take their time to finish it anyway, and it would be a lot cooler if we had to use such a fierce, gory(kind of) monster champ, and it's all thanks to {{champion:92}}  that he gets cancelled off.

Rito, remove{{champion:92}} and proceed with Omen please, thank you :D

replies.body:
We used to get this thread every month in GD.

It's always the same answer:

No.
